system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.

Effect: On hit, all valid targets are @Affliction[suppressed] 5.

Requirement: [Mimikyu] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Play Rough on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Let's Snuggle Forever

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.
